title: Task 1: Describe visual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describes one visual characteristic of the Mosque of Selim II.
Response accurately describes one visual characteristic of the Mosque of Selim II.
Response accurately describes two visual characteristics of the Mosque of Selim II.

title: Task 2: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence to explain how one visual characteristic of the Mosque of Selim II demonstrates continuity with global conventions of mosque architecture.
Response does accurately use specific evidence to explain how one visual characteristic of the Mosque of Selim II demonstrates continuity with global conventions of mosque architecture.

title: Task 3: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence to explain how one visual characteristic of the Mosque of Selim II demonstrates changes from global conventions of mosque architecture.
Response does accurately use specific evidence to explain how one visual characteristic of the Mosque of Selim II demonstrates changes from global conventions of mosque architecture.

title: Task 4: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or a group of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence to explain why one visual characteristic of the Mosque of Selim II demonstrates changes from global conventions of mosque architecture.
Response does accurately use specific evidence to explain why one visual characteristic of the Mosque of Selim II demonstrates changes from global conventions of mosque architecture.
